name: Suicide Strike 1.6
description:
Meet Ashkehana - A 69 years old terrorist who is looking to commit a terror attack in a small mall called "Seas City".

Ashkehana has 60 seconds until his bomb will blow up, and in the meantime he needs to kill as many citizens as possible.

Attention! All Suicide Strike players! your priority is to kill citizens, not cops! citizens will give you more points for kill.

Every kill Caused by the bomb explosion will give 2x more points than a regular kill.

Manage your time well, pick up better guns and kill as many people as you can!
